functions.name: SUM
functions.description: Adds all the numbers in a column.
functions.use_case: Use this function to calculate the total sum of a numeric column.

functions.name: AVERAGE
functions.description: Calculates the average of all the numbers in a column.
functions.use_case: Use this function to find the mean value of a numeric column.

functions.name: COUNT
functions.description: Counts the number of rows that contain numbers in a column.
functions.use_case: Use this to count the number of non-empty values in a column.

functions.name: MIN
functions.description: Returns the smallest number in a column.
functions.use_case: Utilize this function to find the minimum value in a set of values.

functions.name: MAX
functions.description: Returns the largest number in a column.
functions.use_case: Use this to determine the maximum value in a column.

functions.name: CALCULATE
functions.description: Evaluates an expression in a modified filter context.
functions.use_case: This powerful function is used to perform calculations over a set of rows that meet specified criteria.
